content:
path /v3/one/transaction/count/address
operationId OneGetTransactionCount
parameters
description address
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
maxLength 42
minLength 42
description Shard to read data from
in query
name shardID
required False
schema
default 0
type number
summary Get count of outgoing ONE transactions
description 1 credit per API call
Get a number of outgoing ONE transactions for the address When a transaction is sent there can be multiple outgoing transactions
which are not yet processed by the blockchain To distinguish between them there is a counter called a nonce which represents
the order of the transaction in the list of outgoing transactions
responses
200
schema
type number
description Number of transactions that were made from this address Can be used as a nonce parameter in send transaction calls
description OK
